eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Calhoun, MI; AT 08:50 AM ON NOV 26, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:50 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
This is a coordinated monthly local test of the Emergency Alert System, originating from Calhoun County Emergency Management and Calhoun County Consolidated Dispatch Authority.
Equipment that can quickly warn you during emergencies is being tested. If this had been an actual emergency such as a tornado, a toxic material release or other state or local emergency that affects your safety, official messages would have followed the alert tone.
This concludes this test of the Emergency Alert System.
